QuitAll - an improved version One tweak to quit them all QuitAll adds a a button on top of your app/grid switcher, once pressed it clears all apps from the switcher. For the full & original description: https: https://chariz.com/get/quitall Supports iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch running iOS 13.0 - 14.4. main.png 2.png 3.png 4.png NEW FEATURES:
• Now you can control the position of the icon, this solve for those who faced an issues with small screen devices.
